text: Nabii Zakariyya Yi-Rabbow Yi- Barra Baxal tussukuqqem elle Aaxige Asta yoh ab iyye, Yalli kaal gacisak Asta kok atu Sidiica Ayrooy Sidiica Barih gide Sinaam√¢ luk yabtam duude wayya haytaama Ascossil keenil luk yabta koo Akke waytek Atu Nagay Qaafiyatah Anuk, atu isi Rabbi maggom cusaay carraay Saaku Salat kaah Ab kaak iyye Yalli
